page.title: 04A walk near Faversham.
page.content: On Friday morning I got up and got dressed and packed my picnic and had my breakfast. Then I came to school. We left about 10 O'clock. It was quite wet but we went. We saw lots of{hillsides.}We had to climb over lots of{stiles,}there were lots of {footpaths.}We went through some{hop {fields.}Halfway we got very thirsty so we stopped for a quick drink then we went on. We saw{quite a view from the {hills.}I found{lots of cartridges.}We had to collect yellow bits of paper each one was worth a house point. Then we stopped for lunch-I had a nice lunch of a drink,an apple,crisps,dolly mixtures and sandwiches. I liked our walk a lot. I found a{birds egg.}We went over the{motorway bridge}and then we went back to school then we went home. {Dominic Davies
